title: Bug 122110Template can't publish to the path which is the same as create path
description: Bug 122110Template can't publish to the path which is the same as create path
OB: Details:Template can't publish to the path which is the same as create pathSetp:1.Open a report design and set windowspreferencestemplatetemplate folder to c:\test.2.New a template in c:\test3.Publish template to template folderActual result:Template folder can't publish, and this error lead to a new report can't be new, except delete the templateExpection result:Even if the template folder path and template create path is the same is wrong, can it pop up a error message to notice user it is wrong handle.
